Module app.photoapplication
Package app.photoapplication.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
app.photoapplication.model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a user in the photo application system.
Author:
Jimmy Han, Luthfi Jamal Mohamed

    • orTagSearch

      public ArrayList<Photo> orTagSearch(ArrayList<Tag> searchTags)
      Performs an OR tag search across the user's albums.
      Parameters:
      searchTags - The list of tags to search for.
      Returns:
      The list of photos containing at least one of the search tags.

    • andTagSearch

      public ArrayList<Photo> andTagSearch(ArrayList<Tag> searchTags)
      Performs an AND tag search across the user's albums.
      Parameters:
      searchTags - The list of tags to search for.
      Returns:
      The list of photos containing all of the search tags.

    • getPhotosInRange
